node.name: MDT: Magik Development Tools Professional Edition
node.shortdescription:
MDT Professional Edition is a flexible and intuitive Integrated Development Environment (IDE) for GE Smallworld™ GIS developers. MDT provides many useful features for developers writing in Magik language. This Eclipse based suite is a powerful combination of existing approaches and modern programming features like: advanced code visualization, edition and navigation, support for team work, extensibility using Eclipse plug-ins and integrated debugger. MDT proves to significantly accelerate the software development process.

In version 3.0 we have added the support for MUnits 3, a first running version of UML 2 Modeler and Mylyn Context Connector for easier task management (all installed separately as plug-ins)

Along with the release of version 3.2 we have introduced another dedicated plug-in, called MStyle. A tool for Quality Assurance performing automated code quality checks against a set of re-definable rules

For more info about MDT features and functionalities check out the Features page.

We recommend going through our simple Tutorial videos in order to get familiar with MDT basic functionalities.

In case of any questions or problems write at support@mdt.net.
node.body:
MDT Professional Edition is a flexible and intuitive Integrated Development Environment (IDE) for GE Smallworld™ GIS developers. MDT provides many useful features for developers writing in Magik language. This Eclipse based suite is a powerful combination of existing approaches and modern programming features like: advanced code visualization, edition and navigation, support for team work, extensibility using Eclipse plug-ins and integrated debugger. MDT proves to significantly accelerate the software development process.

In version 3.0 we have added the support for MUnits 3, a first running version of UML 2 Modeler and Mylyn Context Connector for easier task management (all installed separately as plug-ins)

Along with the release of version 3.2 we have introduced another dedicated plug-in, called MStyle. A tool for Quality Assurance performing automated code quality checks against a set of re-definable rules

For more info about MDT features and functionalities check out the Features page.

We recommend going through our simple Tutorial videos in order to get familiar with MDT basic functionalities.

In case of any questions or problems write at support@mdt.net.
